entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
